entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
